short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension with a countdown timer that closes the current tab or opens a specified website after the countdown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension with a countdown timer that closes the current tab or replaces the current tab with a specified website after the countdown.
Helps you manage how much time you spend on distracting sites.

How I use it:
I use it mostly to manage my toddlers screentime. We switch on cartoons for them on the web browser, set the timer and once the countdown is up the extension closes the active tab which in this case would be the tab playing the cartoons
